headline: Why Shares of Solid Power Are Plummeting Today
summary: Poised to end 2024 on a sour note, shares of Solid Power (NASDAQ: SLDP) are skidding today as investors seem energized about moving the solid-state battery stock out of their portfolios.  Instead, it seems investors may be overreacting to news from Solid Power's partner Ford (NYSE: F).  Shares of Solid Power closed the day 11.7% lower.

headline: Intel’s Grim Lesson for Boeing: Sometimes Mr. Fix-It Is Too Late
summary: Like Pat Gelsinger, Boeing’s Kelly Ortberg is a technically minded leader tasked with rescuing a storied American manufacturer damaged by bean counters.

headline: Ford X Account Hacked: Ford Motor Company's Official Account on X Hacked, Pro-Palestine Messages Including 'Israel Is a Terrorist State' Shared Before Being Restored
summary: In an official statement, Ford said that their X account was compromised for a brief period. 'Three posts were made that were not authorized or posted by Ford. They do not represent the views of Ford...
